name: Faux Analog Echo Delay
details:
Analog DelayClassic echo with analog warmth
Based on the industry-leading PT2399 chip
High-grade film capacitors and resistors picked for their superior sound and response
Sparkle Fire orange in color, white knobs/graphics
Four knobs - Echo Level, Repeats, Tone, and Delay Time - give you total control
Doesn't mess with your basic guitar tone like so many other delay pedals
Approximately 600ms of delay time available
Completely true bypass
Battery connection and 9V power jack (barrel plug, adapter optional); power draw: 29mA
Note: battery not provided - mains power recommended
Handmade in the U.S.A.
